com.igeekinc.firehose

Class FirehoseInitiator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.igeekinc.firehose.FirehoseInitiator

  • public class FirehoseInitiator
extends java.lang.Object
    FirehoseInitiator initiates a connection to a FirehoseTarget. The connection will then be based to a FirehoseClient (typically) but could also be reversed and given to a FirehoseTarget. This enables a Firehose server to offer services to a client through a firewall (the client's target port must be reachable).
    Author:
    David L. Smith-Uchida
